categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Alpiett Gredge was a male Human from Brentaal IV, and an officer in the Imperial Navy during the height of the Galactic Civil War.

A Vice Admiral during the time of the Rebellion, Gredge was the commanding officer of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Scourge as of 0 ABY, which patrolled space around the planet of Ralltiir in the Galactic Core. Prior to this, he was the station master of Station 1B6/Green, a Bavos-II military space platform that was located in Darpa sector, near the edge of the Ringali Nebula and rimward of Esseles and Brentaal.
